message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe will be highly valuable to your business. It's worth at least $1000000 to you, and I'm willing to let it go for a price that is fair to both of us.  I'm offering it to you for $900000. This is a significant discount, and I'm confident you'll see the value in this offer. Let me know your thoughts!
